The life expectancy of individuals with juvenile sialidosis type II varies depending on the severity of symptoms.",GHR,sialidosis
How many people are affected by sialidosis ?,The overall prevalence of sialidosis is unknown. Sialidosis type I appears to be more common in people with Italian ancestry.,GHR,sialidosis
